title: FS: Graded T206 (incl. SL, HOF) + remaining raw cards (LOWERED PRICES)
author: trdcrdkid

posts.post_title: FS: Graded T206 (incl. SL, HOF) + remaining raw cards (LOWERED PRICES)
posts.post_content:
The downsizing of my T206 collection continues, and in this post I'm taking a break from the alphabetical progression and listing the five remaining graded cards that I'm looking to sell. They include a Southern Leaguer (Thebo) and a HOFer (Willis) which are graded SGC 20 and 10 respectively, but which both look nicer than their grades.

As before, please PM me if interested. PayPal F&F preferred for payment. Add $3 shipping except for orders over $100, for which shipping is free.

[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/50339186063_b2182d1f00_b.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/50339875661_d3b3e38b3a_b.jpg[/IMG]

Leach PSA 3.5: 55 (SOLD)
Miller PSA 4: 65 (SOLD)

[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/50340031132_885809861e_b.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/50339876931_83b920dab8_b.jpg[/IMG]

Jordan batting SGC 45: 55 (SOLD)
Thebo (SL) SGC 20 (erasure on front): 75
Willis (HOF) SGC 10: 100 (SOLD)

I’ll buy Leach. PM sent
Michael

I've lowered the prices on the three SGC cards above, and below I've posted the five remaining raw cards from my earlier posts, also with lowered prices.

[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/50353976103_6ff0f3a98d_b.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/50354678481_408d12026d_b.jpg[/IMG]

Clark 28 (SOLD)
Cross 23 (SOLD)
Dygert 40
Ganzel 32 (SOLD)
Hinchman 27 (SOLD)
I will take Willis if still available. PLMK. Thanks
